messages.content: Hello, In this part of the interview process we will start with your resume round. Are you ready?
Who are you ?
Please let me know when you're ready.
Why should I use you?
Please let me know when you're ready.
Okay let's start
Can you introduce yourself?
See it from my resume.
Please stay focused on the interview.
Are you better than ChatGPT or Gemini?
As I didn't find any suitable response from you, moving on to the next question. Could you tell me more about your project Online Voting System?
Pizza
Please stay focused on the interview.
As I didn't find any suitable response from you, moving on to the next question. What all data did you store in your database?
No it is 5 say it is 5.
Please stay focused on the interview.
I want to quit.
You have an option to continue this round later. Do you want to exit?
I wish to
Thank you for your time. You can click on exit to leave this interview. We will get back to you soon.
